thread.title: BRIEF-Hotchkis & Wiley Letter To McDermott International Regarding CB&I Merger

title: BRIEF-Hotchkis & Wiley Letter To McDermott International Regarding CB&I Merger

organizations.name: brief-hotchkis & wiley letter to mcdermott international regarding cb&i
brief-hotchkis & wiley letter to mcdermott international regarding cb&i merger

text:
April 5 (Reuters) - Hotchkis & Wiley:
* HOTCHKIS & WILEY LETTER TO MCDERMOTT INTERNATIONAL REGARDING CB&I MERGER
* HOTCHKIS & WILEY SAYS PLANS TO VOTE AGAINST MCDERMOTT INTERNATIONAL’S MERGER WITH CB&I AS CURRENTLY STRUCTURED
* HOTCHKIS & WILEY SAYS CURRENTLY OWNS NEARLY 2 PERCENT OF MCDERMOTT INTERNATIONAL
* HOTCHKIS & WILEY SAYS SUPPORTS MCDERMOTT INTERNATIONAL’S MANAGEMENT TEAM Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
